H0.text: Which US state is nicknamed both 'the Colourful State' and 'the Land of Enchantment'. California

H1.text: Which US state is nicknamed both 'the Colourful State' and 'the Land of Enchantment'. Oregon

H2.text: Which US state is nicknamed both 'the Colourful State' and 'the Land of Enchantment'. Arizona

H3.text: Which US state is nicknamed both 'the Colourful State' and 'the Land of Enchantment'. NM

A4.text: earned Arizona the nickname 'the Copper State' at the time of statehood.

A5.text: New Mexico, a state in the United States with the official nickname Land of Enchantment.
